intro: Martensianthus galeottii, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to eastern Africa. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its compact, bushy growth habit. The plant features velvety, dark green leaves and produces showy, tubular flowers in shades of violet, pink, and white. It thrives in humid, well-drained soil and requires bright, indirect light for optimal growth. Martensianthus galeottii is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements.
